name: ENVPrefix
author: Serge
description: A demo CBRAIN task that adds SINGULARITYENV_ prefix to config environment variable names
command-line: touch old_{$MYVARIABLE}; touch new_{$SINGULARITYENV_MYVARIABLE} ; mkdir -p out/human out/blocks out/[OUTPUT_NAME_MEGABYTES];du -a -H -h [CBRAIN_INPUT] > out/human/[OUTPUT_NAME_HUMAN] ; du -a -H [CBRAIN_INPUT] > out/blocks/dummy-[OUTPUT_NAME_BLOCKS] ; du -a -H -m [CBRAIN_INPUT] > out/[OUTPUT_NAME_MEGABYTES]/fixedbase

inputs.name: Input file or directory
inputs.description: Any file or directory in CBRAIN

inputs.name: Name of human report
inputs.description: The name of the text report containing the output of the 'du' command in human units

inputs.name: Name of blocks report
inputs.description: The name of the text report containing the output of the 'du' command in blocks units

inputs.name: Name of megabytes report
inputs.description: The name of the text report containing the output of the 'du' command in megabytes units

output-files.name: old file
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in human units

output-files.name: new file
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in human units

output-files.name: Human output report
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in human units

output-files.name: Blocks output report
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in block units

output-files.name: Megabytes output report
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in megabytes units
